main-seo.main-title: Buy plastic bags, garbage bags, stretch film, and cellophane gloves wholesale and retail.
main-seo.main-text: Looking for quality plastic bags, garbage bags, stretch wrap, or cellophane gloves? Our store offers a wide range of packaging and household goods at affordable prices! We specialize in selling products that are ideal for home, business, offices, restaurants, warehouses, and manufacturing.

content1.text: different sizes, densities and formats for packaging products, goods and things.

content2.text: from standard volumes to heavy-duty construction waste bags.

content3.text: for reliable fixation of cargo on pallets, packaging of goods and protection against damage.

content4.text: disposable, ideal for use in the food industry, cleaning and medicine.

content5.text: all sizes, including reinforced options for large volumes of waste.

content1.title: Packaging of products and goods.

index-page.summary: Don't delay! Provide your home or business with quality packaging materials right now!!!

products-page.title: Goods
products-page.description: Welcome to our store! Here you will find a wide range of products for packaging and household needs: garbage bags, packaging bags, stretch film, zip bags and cellophane gloves. Product quality and ease of use are guaranteed!

about-page.title: About the company
about-page.description: We are a company with over 20 years of experience in the market, engaged in the wholesale and retail sale of packaging products. Learn about the history of our activities, our values ​​and advantages that make us a reliable partner for your business and everyday needs.

about-us.title: About us
about-us.text: Welcome to korzinka.in.ua! We are a company engaged in wholesale and retail sales of various packaging products. In the assortment of korzinka.in.ua you will find cellophane bags, garbage bags, zip bags, salting bags, packaging bags, T-shirt bags and packaging bags. Since our founding, we have come a long way, and today we have over 20 years of experience in the market. Our beginnings were in the Barabashovo market, and since then we have continued to strengthen our positions, cooperating with leading manufacturers, in particular with the Komserv company, which allows us to guarantee the highest quality of our products.

our-mission.title: Our mission
our-mission.text: We strive to provide you with the best packaging solutions that meet the requirements of modern business and everyday life. Offering a wide range of products, we always emphasize their quality and reliability. Our goals are to provide each customer with products that are suitable for specific needs and help them effectively solve packaging tasks.

content1.title: Quality:
content1.text: We always focus on the high quality of our products. Thanks to close cooperation with the company Komserv, we ensure stable production and delivery of only reliable goods.

content2.title: Innovation:
content2.text: We do not stop there and are constantly improving our range, adapting it to the needs of the market and our customers.

content3.title: Reliability:
content3.text: We strive for long-term relationships with each client, so we always ensure stability in quality, delivery, and service.

content4.title: Flexibility:
content4.text: We offer a variety of terms of cooperation - from small retail buyers to large wholesale orders. It is important for us to satisfy every client, regardless of the volume of purchase.

content1.text: Here you will find packaging solutions for every taste and for every purpose.

content2.text: Cooperation with Comserv allows us to maintain high standards of production and supply of goods.

content3.text: Thanks to well-established supply channels and optimized production processes, we can offer favorable prices without compromising product quality.

content4.text: More than 20 years of experience in the market allow us to perfectly understand customer needs.

content5.text: We offer special conditions for regular customers and personalization of orders.

why-us.title: Why choose us?
why-us.text: Our customers choose us due to the consistently high quality of our products, flexible terms of cooperation and favorable prices. We understand the importance of proper packaging for your business, so we provide only the best solutions for each industry, be it retail, food industry or other areas.

our-clients.title: Our clients
our-clients.text: Our regular clients include both large corporate customers and small businesses. We are happy to work with everyone and are ready to offer the best packaging solutions for any need.

contact-us.title: Contact us
contact-us.text: We are always happy to help! If you have any questions or want to place an order, please contact us in any way convenient for you. Our specialists are ready to provide advice and help with product selection.

about-page.summary: A reliable partner for your business and life.

pay-delivery.title: Payment and delivery
pay-delivery.description: Thank you for choosing our store! We strive to provide a comfortable and fast payment and delivery process. In this section you will find all the necessary information about payment methods, delivery options and order receipt times.

payment.title: Payment
payment.text: We offer several payment methods for your convenience:

content1.text: Pay online using Visa, MasterCard or other cards that support online payments. All transactions are protected by modern security standards.

content2.text: Payment via popular payment systems such as PayPal, Google Pay, Apple Pay or others available in your region.

content3.text: For legal entities, payment to a current account is possible. Contact us to arrange an invoice.

content4.text: You can pay for your order upon receipt at the pick-up point or from the courier (additional fees may apply).

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.text: We cooperate with reliable logistics companies to ensure fast and high-quality delivery.

content1.text: Door-to-door delivery to any location. Delivery times depend on your location and range from 1 to 7 business days.

content2.text: Pick up your order at a convenient time from the nearest pickup point. You can choose the point when placing your order.

content3.text: For remote regions, shipping via mail is available. Delivery time is specified during checkout.

delivery-condition.title: Delivery terms
delivery-condition.text: We offer several payment methods for your convenience:

content1.text: All orders are processed within 1-2 business days.

content2.text: The cost depends on the delivery method and your region. The exact amount will be calculated during checkout.

content3.text: We offer free shipping for orders over UAH 5,000. The shipping cost will be calculated during checkout.

content4.text: After sending your order, you will receive a tracking number for your package.

pay-delivery.summary: If you have additional questions, please contact our support team by phone +380 99 999 99 99 or email:

buyers-page.title: Buyer assistance
buyers-page.description: We have prepared answers to frequently asked questions and recommendations that will help you in the process of placing and receiving your orders.

set-order.title: How to place an order?
set-order.text: We offer several payment methods for your convenience:
set-order.content1: Select a product from the catalog and click the “Add to Cart” button. Go to the cart, review the list of selected products and click "Checkout".
set-order.content2: Enter your contact details, delivery address and choose a payment method. Confirm your order. A confirmation with details will be sent to the email address provided.

change-order.title: How do I change or cancel an order?

change-order.text: If your order has not yet been sent, you can contact our support service by phone +380 99 999 99 99 or email:

cancel-order.text: To cancel an order, please contact us with your order number. If the order has already been shipped, cancellation is only possible after the goods have been received and returned.

content1.text: All products have a warranty in accordance with the law.

content2.text: You can return the product within 14 days of receipt, provided it is in its original condition and packaging.

content3.text: Contact our support team for return instructions.

content1.strong: Can I order delivery to another city?
content1.text: Yes, we deliver orders nationwide. The cost and delivery time depend on your region.

content2.strong: What should I do if I received a damaged product?
content2.text: If you find damage to the product, please contact our support team immediately and provide photos of the damage.

content3.strong: Can I get a discount on my first order?
content3.text: Yes, when you subscribe to our newsletter you will receive a discount on your first order. For details, see the "News" page.

order-tracking.title: Order tracking
order-tracking.text: After sending the order, a track number will be sent to the specified email, with which you can track the delivery status on the transport company's website.

rest-question.title: If you have any questions, we are always ready to help!
rest-question.text: Contact our support service in any convenient way:

summary.title: We are always here to help!
summary.text: Thank you for choosing us. If you have any questions, need advice or help, our team is always ready to support you. Contact us via a convenient communication channel for you, and we will definitely find a solution. +38 099 999 99 99 or write to email:

news-page.title: News
news-page.description: Stay up to date with the latest events! Here you will find all the important information about new products, promotions, events and other events related to our company.

summary.title: Stay with us on the wave of news!
summary.description: Don't miss any important event — follow our updates to always be up to date with the latest news, promotions and new products. We are constantly working to offer you the most up-to-date information about our products, services and social initiatives. Join our community, receive advantageous offers first and be a part of important changes!

mail.title: Stay in touch with us!
mail.text: And stay up to date with the latest discounts and news
